content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day November 3, 2022 Using AI to protect against BEC attacks November 3, 2022 With no payload to detect, how best can organizations protect themselves from Business Email Compromise and other social engineering attacks? by John Stevenson Sometimes the simplest frauds are the most successful. Some years ago, local authorities in the UK were targeted by a series of just such frauds.
